welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hawthorn Woods, where small-town charm meets natural beauty! Known for its peaceful atmosphere and picturesque landscapes, we invite you to immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Memorial Airport serves as a hub for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft with personalized services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
